title: Aldinach
html:
Aldinach

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
& Aldinach (No tile)
Difficulty 31
Attacks Claw 1d4 baleful polymorph, Claw 1d4 baleful polymorph, Cast 1d4 steal item
& Aldinach (No tile)
Difficulty 31
Attacks

Claw 1d4 baleful polymorph, Claw 1d4 baleful polymorph, Cast 1d4 steal item

Base level 25
Base experience 1070
Speed 20
Base AC -20
Base MR 100
Alignment -14 (chaotic)
Frequency (by normal means) 0 (Not randomly generated)
Genocidable No
Weight 1500
Nutritional value 500
Size huge
Resistances poison, acid
Resistances conveyed fire, cold

Aldinach:

  • can swim.
  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • can see invisible creatures.
  • is poisonous to eat.
  • does not eat. (*)
  • is not a valid polymorphable form.
  • is a demon.
  • is a lord to its kind.
  • is female.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • can follow you to other levels.
  • is nasty.
  • can pick up weapons and food.
  • wants the Amulet of Yendor.
  • waits for you to come.
  • wants the Amulet of Yendor, the Bell of Opening, the Book of the Dead, the Candelabrum of Invocation, and your quest artifact.
  • has infravision.
  • can be seen through infravision.
  • appears only in Gehennom.
  • never leaves a corpse.
  • resists death magic.

Retrieved from "https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Aldinach&oldid=131429"
